sentences.sentence: When he had unwrapped her, he turned homewards with his sled.
sentences.translation: 他解开包着她的袋子，就驾着雪橇回家了。

sentences.sentence: The first twig, dear father, that brushes against your hat when you turn your face to come homewards.
sentences.translation: 第一根小树枝，亲爱的爸爸，你转身回家时碰到你帽子的树枝。
